__e: I see two able-bodied, entitled young white men who lucked into more money than most people see in five lifetimes, and who, if they hadn't had their millions stolen, would have promptly squandered them on more things
He'd heard her name often during the year and a half since they'd last met.
They hadn't spoken in years, but I think he's really bothered by this.
So she and Ben made a date for her first lesson-
They said they'd agreed it with my mum and then they asked me what I wanted to do, but I think they'd have made me stay anyway.
It's like they heard I was having some fun and they got together to take it away from me.
